TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback(object collection, object collectionItems);
.class public auto ansi sealed XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback(collection As Object, collectionItems As Object)
public delegate void XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback(System::Object ^ collection, System::Object ^ collectionItems);
type XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback = delegate of obj * obj -> unit

param.name: collection
param.span: 复制集合项数组的目标集合。

span.span: The collection into which the collection items array is copied.

param.name: collectionItems
param.span: 要复制到 object collection 的项的数组。

span.span: An array of items to be copied into the object collection.

summary.span: 类用于对映射到集合或枚举的 SOAP 编码的 XML 数据类型进行反序列化的委托。

span.span: Delegate used by the class for deserialization of SOAP-encoded XML data types that map to collections or enumerations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化过程中，.NET Framework XML 序列化基础结构动态生成和编译的临时类，用于反序列化派生自类。During initialization, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically generates and compiles a temporary class for deserialization derived from the class. 在此过程中，.NET Framework 生成使用的集合修正方法委托。During this process, the .NET Framework generates collection fix-up methods that use the delegate. SOAP 编码的数组或 SOAP 编码的多引用元素的数据类型，在任一情况下，映射到.NET Framework 集合或枚举发生这种情况。This occurs for SOAP-encoded arrays or SOAP-encoded, multi-reference elements whose data types, in either case, map to .NET Framework collections or enumerations. 必要时，反序列化期间调用集合修复方法。As necessary, the collection fix-up method is called during deserialization. 您不应直接实例化。You should not directly instantiate . SOAP 编码为 SOAP 1.1 规范的第 5 节中所述。SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
